name: move-whisperer
description: MoveWhisperer - The AI that speaks Move

scripts.cf:migrate: npx wrangler d1 execute move-whisperer-db --file=migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute move-whisperer-db --file=migrations/0002_marketplace_schema.sql
scripts.cf:dev: cd web && pnpm run build && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages && npx wrangler pages dev .vercel/output/static --compatibility-date=2024-01-01 --compatibility-flags=nodejs_compat
scripts.cf:deploy: cd web && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages && npx wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name=move-whisperer
